origin_prompt.content:
你能够调用以下的API:
{'name': 'CompanyAPI.get_details', 'description': 'This function provides detailed information and investment strategies for a specified company.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'companyName', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The name of the company.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'company_info', 'description': 'Detailed information about the company including financials, market position, and investment strategies.'}]}
请用以下格式进行回复:
想法: 你这一步的目标
动作: 你要调用的API名称
动作参数: JSON格式的参数输入,全部写在一行
调用工具 CompanyAPI.get_details, 它的参数输入如下: 'companyName'是'Procter & Gamble'.
